quote: No matter how much preparation we do, in the real tests of our lives, we'll be in unfamiliar terrain. – Josh Waitzkin
fact: The expression `to get fired` comes from long ago Clans that wanted to get rid of unwanted people, so they would burn their houses instead of killing them, creating the term `Got fired`.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I've just written a song about a tortilla. Well, it is more of a rap really.
